meanings: completely, absolutely, entirely, utterly, totally; (부정문에서) not at all, not in the least
have not the slightest[remotest, faintest] idea of
have not the least[slightest, remotest] idea of

examples.korean: He made no secret of his ambition. 발음듣기 그는 자신의 야망을 전혀 비밀로 하지[감추지] 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He made no secret of his ambition. 발음

examples.korean: She was totally unsuited for the job. 발음듣기 그녀는 전혀 그 일자리에 부적합했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was totally unsuited for the job. 발음

examples.korean: The letter was devoid of warmth and feeling. 발음듣기 그 편지에는 따스함과 감정이 전혀 들어 있지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The letter was devoid of warmth and feeling. 발음

examples.korean: He was less than enamoured of the music. 발음듣기 그는 그 음악이 전혀 마음에 들지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was less than enamoured of the music. 발음

examples.korean: She felt estranged from her former existence. 발음듣기 그녀는 이전의 자기 자신과 전혀 다른 사람이 된 기분이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She felt estranged from her former existence. 발음
